data.title: Phillips on Mark Shapiro's press conference takeaways, Atkins' stance in Toronto and the direction of the team
data.meta_description: TSN Baseball Insider Steve Phillips joined OverDrive to discuss his takeaways from Mark Shapiro's press conference, the perception of the team's next steps, Ross Atkins and John Schneider's future with the franchise, the importance of stability for the team, the stance in the AL East, the direction of making improvements on the roster and more.
data.text:
Game Play: August 28, 2024 - Hour 2

In the second hour of Game Play, Matt Cauz makes some tough decisions in another edition of "This or That". Then Matt is joined by The Ringer's Joe House to take a look at betting trends across the NFL and the season ahead for the Washington Commanders.

Game Play: August 28, 2024 - Hour 1

In the first hour of Game Play, Matt Cauz previews the 2024 Summer Paralympics. Then Matt is joined by YouTuber Foolish Baseball to break down the biggest storylines across MLB.

Golf Talk Canada - Season 16 - Episode 61

Today, Bob Weeks and Adam Scully discuss all of the latest in the world of golf! We preview the Tour Championship! Plus, we chat with both Presidents Cup captains, Mike Weir and Jim Furyk. And Johnny Keefer, the most recent winner on PGA Tour Americas joins the show!

First Up: August 28th, 2024 - Hour 4

The fourth and final hour of First Up with Brendan Dunlop and Carlo Colaiacovo are we are joined by Lenny DiNardo of NESN to chat Red Sox vs Jays, Mark Zecchino to look ahead to the PGA Championship, Sam Bennett to discuss winning the Stanley Cup and give you our FanDuel best bets

Zecchino on renovated East Lake hosting Tour Championship, if anyone can match Scheffler and more

Host of Golf Talk Canada Mark Zecchino joins us to chat about a newly renovated East Lake hosting the Tour Championship, if the PGA will change the format, if anyone can catch Scottie Scheffler and more.

DiNardo on Red Sox-Jays series, teams going in different directions since trade deadline and more

Former MLB pitcher and NESN analyst, Lenny DiNardo, joins us to chat about the Red Sox beating the Blue Jays, what has gonewrong for the Sox since the trade deadline, if the Red Sox can make the playoffs and more.

Kaplan on Prescott's contract situation, where he thinks Aiyuk will end up and more

From NFL on ESPN, Evan Kaplan, joins us to chat about Dak Prescott's contract situation, if he will hit free agency, where he thinks Brandon Aiyuk will end up, if DeShaun Watson's starting job is on the line and more.

First Up: August 28th, 2024 - Hour 1

The first hour of First Up with Brendan Dunlop and Carlo Colaiacovo as we discuss the Blue Jays ending their winning streak vs the Red Sox, LeBron saying Bronny can't call him dad at practice and we look into Arad's Crystal Ball for the future.

OverDrive - August 27, 2024 - Hour 3

Join Bryan Hayes and Gord Miller for hour 3. Bryan and Gord chat about why the Buffalo Bills should be playing outside and the beauty of football weather. Ryan Harris joined the show to discuss AFC North rivalries, the Chiefs’ historic dominance and why the Steelers are a sleeper contender. We finished the show with the Best Bets powered by FanDuel.

OverDrive - August 27, 2024 - Hour 2

Join Bryan Hayes and Gord Miller for hour 2. Bryan and Gord chat about Lou Lamoriello's rules, the growth of pickleball, the biggest storylines across the NFL and more. Mark Masters joined the show to chat about Auger-Aliassime’s shocking first-round loss at the U.S Open, Jannik Sinner’s doping controversy and the biggest Leafs storyline heading into camp. The guys also got into another edition of Confirm or Deny.
